content:
Stremio is an app that when paired with Real-Debrid, allows you to stream almost any movie or tv show in high quality.
Real Debrid costs money but it is inexpensive and allows for much faster streaming speeds as aposed to streaming torrents. No VPN is needed to use RD as it is all through DDL. It torrents movies for you and puts them on their servers which is where you stream them from. This allows super fast streaming without torrent activity on your end.
Real Debrid Real Debrid is what is used to provide media.
Go to Real-Debrid and click Sign Up. Make an account and then buy the service. Stremio Stremio is the service used to display all the movies/TV and where you can have your library. It is the User-Interface.
Download Stremio for your device and set it up by running the installer.
Once installed, visit this link to install torrentio: https://torrentio.strem.fun/configure
Don’t worry about any of the fields except for Debrid Provider. Select Real-Debrid
Find the box titled RealDebrid API Key
Copy the api from the link provided and then paste it in the empty box on the torrentio page.
click Install
Complete Search for your media and look for streams with [RD] at the front. These are provided from Real-Debrid. If one doesn’t work, try another. You can see the quality and file size of the streams too.
summary:
Stremio is an app that when paired with Real-Debrid, allows you to stream almost any movie or tv show in high quality.
Real Debrid costs money but it is inexpensive and allows for much faster streaming speeds as aposed to streaming torrents. No VPN is needed to use RD as it is all through DDL. It torrents movies for you and puts them on their servers which is where you stream them from.
title: Stremio + Real-Debrid

content:
This guide will only list basic tools which are commonly needed for sailing the seas.
There are much bigger lists out there for useful tools however this guide will not list every single useful tool in order to keep it simple and easy to read. This keeps it from being overwhelming and confusing for new users.
Torrents - qbittorrent For torrenting qbittorrent is the most commonly recommended. It is open source and light weight.
Transmission and Deluge are other open source torrent clients that are recommended.
VPN - Mullvad The best privacy respecting VPN is Mullvad, however it does not support port forwarding.
Ad-block - uBlock OriginuBlock Origin is the best ad-blocker out there. It also acts as a filter which is regularly updated.
Fast Forward is a continuation of Universal Bypass, which skips link shorteners.
Anti-Virus Virus Total If you have a file which you want to open but suspect it for containing something malicous then you can upload it to Virus Total which will scan it for you.
summary:
This guide will only list basic tools which are commonly needed for sailing the seas.
There are much bigger lists out there for useful tools however this guide will not list every single useful tool in order to keep it simple and easy to read. This keeps it from being overwhelming and confusing for new users.
Torrents - qbittorrent For torrenting qbittorrent is the most commonly recommended. It is open source and light weight.
title: Recomended Tools

content:
Installing Windows IoT Enterprise LTS version from a USB.
You will need an empty USB with at least 8gb of storage
Step 1: Making a bootable USB Download the Windows 11 IoT Enterprise LTSC .iso from MassGrave The IoT Enterprise LTSC is a version of Windows that doesn’t include any bloatware and has far fewer updates by only giving the needed security ones.
Download and run Balena Etcher Select the Windows .iso file for the image Select your USB for the drive :warning: The next step will format your USB deleting everything on it. :warning: Click flash Step 2: Booting the USB Once the flashing is complete restart your computer with the USB still plugged include Enter your BIOS screen by pressing DEL or F2 or enter on startup The exact button you need to press varies from momtherboards. You can search your motherboard and find what button enters BIOS on startup.
Change the boot order so your computer boots from the USB Go through the Windows Installation If Windows asks you to login to your work or school account, find the offline symbol and press that. This will let you sign in without a Microsoft account.
Step 3: Activating Windows Open powershell Enter this code: irm https://get.activated.win | iex Press 1 on your keyboard to activate Windows. Complete Windows 11 IoT Enterprise LTS is now fully activated on your PC.
summary:
Installing Windows IoT Enterprise LTS version from a USB.
You will need an empty USB with at least 8gb of storage
Step 1: Making a bootable USB Download the Windows 11 IoT Enterprise LTSC .iso from MassGrave The IoT Enterprise LTSC is a version of Windows that doesn’t include any bloatware and has far fewer updates by only giving the needed security ones.
Download and run Balena Etcher Select the Windows .
title: Windows 11
